title: Pete Carroll & Dr. Michael Gervais on Russell Wilson & Importance of Staying in the Moment
itunes:title: Pete Carroll & Dr. Michael Gervais on Russell Wilson & Importance of Staying in the Moment
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by Seahawks head coach Pete Carroll and high performance psychologist Dr. Michael Gervais, as they talk about QB Russell Wilson, the importance of staying in the moment and much more (4:38). Next, the pair discuss what they learned from the main points of the interview (19:47). To wrap up the show, the duo react to the news that the NFL is considering expanding the amount of players allowed on practice squads (23:23).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
